snippet: Three of former Representative Thaddeus McCotter’s aides pleaded not guilty to fraud charges on Friday.
abstract: Three aides of former Michigan Rep Thaddeus McCotter plead not guilty to fraud charges, a day after state's attorney general accused McCotter of being unaware while his staff members faked petition signatures that ultimately forced him to resign.
lead_paragraph: Three of former Representative Thaddeus McCotter’s aides pleaded not guilty to fraud charges on Friday.

headline.main: Michigan: Aides To Ex-Congressman Are Arraigned
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Aides To Ex-Congressman Are Arraigned
